articles.content: JERUSALEM (AP) — Israeli troops shot dead two Palestinians and wounded a third on Gaza’s beach, the military acknowledged Saturday, responding to a video that showed one man falling to the ground after walking in an open area and then a bulldozer pus... [3172 chars]

articles.title: Stabbed Iranian journalist’s interview with Netanyahu made him ‘a target for wrath’
articles.description: Pouria Zeraati, who hosts a show on the anti-regime network Iran International, is recovering in hospital after attack by two people
articles.content:
The Iranian journalist attacked in London on Friday had incurred “wrath” for conducting an interview with Benjamin Netanyahu, the Israeli Prime Minister, according to a news website run by the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) in Iran.

articles.title: 'MS Dhoni played under Virat Kohli': Ashwin blasts Hardik Pandya haters, calls his criticism ‘cinema culture’
articles.description: Amid a tough IPL phase, Hardik Pandya is receiving support from various quarters including India's legendary spinner Ravichandran Ashwin who quoted Sachin Tendulkar and Sourav Ganguly's example to defend the MI skipper
articles.content: Hardik Pandya is facing a hostile crowd at stadiums, who are booing the MI skipper and trolling him for his on-field decisions. The all-rounder has cleared that the criticism doesn't affect him much, but the intensity of the anger against him is look... [2424 chars]

articles.title: Clocks go forward tonight as 'summer time' begins
articles.description: 'Summer time' in Ireland will officially begin this weekend with clocks going forward by one hour overnight tonight.
articles.content:
'Summer time' in Ireland will officially begin this weekend with clocks going forward by one hour overnight tonight.
At 1am clocks will go forward an hour to 2am. Most smartphones, tablets and computers will update automatically.
The practice of chan... [976 chars]

articles.title: American guns fuel Haiti crisis
articles.description: The crisis in Haiti over gangs who have overrun the country and outmatched security forces is fueled in part by a major, illegal flow of U.S. guns to the Caribbean nation, a longstanding problem that has only grown worse despite efforts from the Biden administration to tackle it.  The gangs running amok on the island…

articles.title: Pope Francis skips Good Friday event at last minute ‘to preserve health’ for Easter rituals
articles.description: Pope Francis pulled out of a Good Friday service at the last minute, the Vatican said, “to preserve his health” ahead of major Easter events over the weekend.
articles.content:
CNN —
Pope Francis pulled out of a Good Friday service at the last minute, the Vatican said, “to preserve his health” ahead of major Easter events over the weekend.
